name: Sidebar Navigation + Editor
description: Sidebar navigation plus main editor pane, common in document apps
inspiration: RICO dataset - document editing apps (Google Docs, Notion)
cognitiveRationale: Reduces navigation overhead; outline externalizes document structure

name: Visual Ideation Split
description: Split mind map and kanban board with chat assistant
cognitiveRationale: Supports divergent thinking; spatial layout matches visual cognitive style

name: Focused Writing + Metrics
description: Editor with adjacent stats/insights panel for progress tracking
inspiration: RICO dataset - writing tools (iA Writer, Hemingway)
cognitiveRationale: Focus mode with peripheral awareness of progress metrics

name: Research + Synthesis
description: Source panel, mind map for themes, and notes editor
cognitiveRationale: Externalizes source tracking; mind map clusters themes

name: Review + Timeline
description: Editor with revision timeline and AI review assistant
inspiration: RICO dataset - editing tools (Word Track Changes, Git diff)
cognitiveRationale: Timeline externalizes revision history; reduces memory load

name: Full Ideation Workspace
description: Mind map, kanban, research panel, and chat for deep brainstorming
cognitiveRationale: Maximum cognitive offloading for complex ideation tasks

name: Compact Writing Focus
description: Minimal distraction writing with hidden panels
cognitiveRationale: Eliminates visual clutter; maximizes focus on content creation
